settings.description_text: A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul.
A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul.
I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm.
I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm.

settings.editor: I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents. I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now. When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me
